    About

    I am a passionate full stack developer and a recent graduate of Purdue University. In the past, I have worked for USAA and Blast Radius. I design and develop web applications that are simple and fun to use.

    If you would like to learn more about me and my experience, feel free to check out my interactive resume, or download a PDF.

    If you would like to learn more about me and my experience, feel free to check out my resume.

    Projects

    PlaceMorty

    PlaceMorty provides quick access to placeholder images via AWS S3 storage, Redis caching, and an admin dashboard for curation.

    Demo GitHub

    Personal Portfolio

    My personal portfolio built with vanilla JavaScript, showcases my work and features an interactive CLI resume.

    Shower Thoughts Newtab

    This Chrome Extension creates a fun newtab page, leveraging the Web Storage API for caching reddit data and storing user options.

    Download GitHub

    Personal URL Shortener

    This custom URL shortener generates more memorable links for frequented websites. Built with Express, React, and Redux.
